mapper.select: CREATE TABLE tbl_dayhealth ( my_seq NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, my_username nVARCHAR2(50) NOT NULL, my_list nVARCHAR2(50) NOT NULL, my_date VARCHAR2(15) NOT NULL, my_weight VARCHAR2(15) NOT NULL, my_rep VARCHAR2(15) NOT NULL )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_dayhealth ( my_seq, my_username, my_list, my_date, my_weight, my_rep ) VALUES ( seq_dayhealth.nextval, #{my_username}, #{my_list}, #{my_date}, #{my_weight}, #{my_rep} )
